amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in the bill for implementation of Executive Order 13547 which requires that various bureaucracies zone the ocean, the Great Lakes and their sources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for National Ocean Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 174 (Roll no. 234).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 174 (Roll no. 234).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Flores.
